TITLE: Demonstration of Boostrap styles for DocOnce documents
DATE: today

DocOnce supports many variants of the Bootstrap

===== Basic Bootstrap styles =====

"Plain Bootstrap style": "bootstrap_plain.html" generated by

!bc sys
doconce format html bootstrap_demo --html_style=bootstrap
        --pygments_html_style=default --html_admon=bootstrap_panel
        --html_output=bootstrap_plain
doconce split_html bootstrap_plain
!ec


===== Bootswatch styles =====

Typical generation of styles with white background:

!bc sys
doconce format html bootstrap_demo --html_style=bootswatch_spacelab
        --pygments_html_style=default --html_admon=bootstrap_panel
        --html_output=spacelab --html_code_style=inherit
!ec
For dark styles we add `--html_pre_style=inherit --keep_pygments_html_bg`
as options to avoid white background:

!bc sys
doconce format html bootstrap_demo --html_style=bootswatch_cyborg
        --pygments_html_style=monokai --html_admon=bootstrap_panel
        --html_output=cyborg --keep_pygments_html_bg
        --html_code_style=inherit --html_pre_style=inherit
!ec

Admons as panels:

 * White background:
   * "cerulean": "cerulean.html"
   * "cosmo": "cosmo.html"
   * "flatly": "flatly.html"
   * "journal": "journal.html"
   * "lumen": "lumen.html"
   * "readable": "readable.html"
   * "simplex": "simplex.html"
   * "spacelab": "spacelab.html"
   * "united": "united.html"
   * "yeti": "yeti.html"
 * Dark background:
   * "amelia": "amelia.html"
   * "cyborg": "cyborg.html"
   * "darkly": "darkly.html"
   * "slate": "slate.html"
   * "superhero": "superhero.html"

Admons as alerts (colored background):

 * White background:
   * "cerulean": "cerulean_v1.html"
   * "cosmo": "cosmo_v1.html"
   * "flatly": "flatly_v1.html"
   * "journal": "journal_v1.html"
   * "lumen": "lumen_v1.html"
   * "readable": "readable_v1.html"
   * "simplex": "simplex_v1.html"
   * "spacelab": "spacelab_v1.html"
   * "united": "united_v1.html"
   * "yeti": "yeti_v1.html"
 * Dark background:
   * "amelia": "amelia_v1.html"
   * "cyborg": "cyborg_v1.html"
   * "darkly": "darkly_v1.html"
   * "slate": "slate_v1.html"
   * "superhero": "superhero_v1.html"

===== Color variations of the original Bootstrap theme =====

 * "bloodish": "bootstrap_bloodish.html" (`--html_style=bootstrap_bloodish`)
 * "Flat UI": "bootstrap_FlatUI.html" (`--html_style=bootstrap_FlatUI`)
 * "blue": "bootstrap_blue.html" (`--html_style=bootstrap_blue`)
 * "bluegray": "bootstrap_bluegray.html" (`--html_style=bootstrap_bluegray`)
 * "brown": "bootstrap_brown.html" (`--html_style=bootstrap_brown`)
 * "red": "bootstrap_red.html" (`--html_style=bootstrap_red`)
 * "bootflat": "bootstrap_bootflat.html" (`--html_style=bootstrap_bootflat`)
 * "cbc": "cbc.html" (`--html_style=bootstrap_cbc`)

===== Special templates based on Bootstrap themes =====

 * "vagrant": "vagrant.html" (`--html_style=bootstrap --html_template=template_vagrant.html --html_toc_indent=0`)
 * "bootstrap with toc": "bootstrap_wtoc.html" (`--html_style=bootstrap --html_template=template_bootstrap_wtoc.html`)
